title: Centipoise to Pascal-Seconds Converter – cP to Pa·s, mPa·s, Poise

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Key relationships used by this converter 1 P = 0.1 Pa·s 1 cP = 0.01 P = 0.001 Pa·s 1 Pa·s = 10 P = 1000 cP 1 mPa·s = 0.001 Pa·s Conversion formulas Pa·s = cP × 0.001 cP = Pa·s × 1000 P = Pa·s ÷ 0.1 = Pa·s × 10 mPa·s = Pa·s × 1000

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \(\nu = \dfrac{\mu}{\rho}\) where \(\nu\) is kinematic viscosity, \(\mu\) is dynamic viscosity and \(\rho\) is density.
